Negative_Review: It isn t cheap
Positive_Review: We were given 2 single pull out beds which were ideal for our little ones On arrival they were given toys and there were toys on their beds when we got into the room too The bed was extremely comfortable We had room service 3 times due to one of us being unwell and the food was delicious and portions were very good

Negative_Review: Breakfast gets busy and sometimes not possible to get sitting space
Positive_Review: This is a really good hotel close to Gare Montparnasse station Very easy to get to the location is excellent The staff are helpful and the breakfast is really good to get your started with your day

Negative_Review: lack of highchairs in restaurant
Positive_Review: Comfy beds activities for the kids little extras i e toblerones free from mini bar nice little touches excellent stay

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Great location bus direct from airport to nearby Gare Montparnasse Room was good size for 3 and clean with good facilities Breakfast buffet good and no issues finding enough to suit a dairy free diet and slightly fussy 11 year old We walked a lot and ate in nearby restaurants State was probably pick of these

Negative_Review: They didn t replace the tea bags after you used a specific flavor
Positive_Review: The sofa bed in the room really handy with kids And the location was really good Especially traveling from gare du Nord just one metro line to connect you from the hotel

Negative_Review: The toilet is too small for comfort breakfast area is too small for the hotel crowd Suggest to ask guests to register their intended eating time to manage the crowd
Positive_Review: Location is great room is clean and modern

Negative_Review: The place is good to stay located in the old neighbourhood of Montparnasse but I found the staff not so friendly I had arrived early morning and I had already requested for early check in but that did not happen and I can understand that there might be an unavailability of room but then I had requested to contact the property via booking com multiple times since I wanted to extend another night at the hotel and even then Novotel never got in touch with me It was a difficult experience managing this hotel
Positive_Review: The rooms were spacious and clean The bed was comfortable Breakfast was like any other 3 4 star hotel buffet spread The staff was fine The location of the hotel is quite convenient

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The property was recently updated We got an upgrade to a more comfortable room with balcony and view to Eiffel Tower with no extra cost so as to compensate the delay in letting us in

Negative_Review: The Eiffel Tower looked closer than it was albeit walkable but at the end of a day of sightseeing it was too much to walk back so we had to take a short taxi ride
Positive_Review: We enjoyed the buffet breakfast and the variety of items available There was something for everyone The self serve coffee station had a nice selection of coffees Our interaction with the front desk staff was always positive and pleasant from check in to check out This was our first trip to Europe and at the suggestion of family to consider the Novatel brand we were not disappointed The hotel smelled clean and was well taken care of The size of our room was ample for 3 guests

Negative_Review: The breakfast was really bad Noisy crowdy messy and few seatings and too little time Only open to 9 30 on weekdays Had to que every morning to get a table The rooms are too small for a family
Positive_Review: Good location and great parking in a garage Superior rooms are good but small for a family

Negative_Review: Little off the main road not many kid friendly restaurants close by a little distances away for child friendly
Positive_Review: Near station but a little far from other attractions and not too close from other restaurants

Negative_Review: It s hard to find even if arriving from Gare Montparnase In fact thou are better off arriving via Line 6 Pasteur
Positive_Review: The rooms are modern and clean The beds are very comfortable The breakfast is good

Negative_Review: Air conditioning was NOT Working breakfast was not having enough variety no pool no bath tub Not worth for money
Positive_Review: Pretty much nothing My past experiences in Thailand with Novotel was fantastic but with this experience I don t think I would go for Novotel

Negative_Review: The hotel is good but too overpriced For that price it could be closer to the subway it s about 10min walking to the nearest station not far but not so close for the price and could at least include breakfast I ve stayed in similar hotels for 1 3 of that price
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Parking facilities very small Very complicated to park The money that you pay for the rooms and services is high
Positive_Review: The location is close to the station and it is convenient

Negative_Review: It was expensive but I knew it was going to be when I booked It is a great location and we only had one night in Paris so I wanted to make sure it was nice
Positive_Review: What a beautiful room I think it was the nicest I ve ever stayed in We had a premium room so it even included snacks and drinks from the room fridge Nice surprise It was clean and my two teenagers were so happy to find that the pull out bed could split into two twins Close to the train station too We showed up very early and were pleasantly surprised they d watch our bags while we walked around We were so tired from traveling from London Then when we got there to check our bags they gave us the room It was so cool and quiet and clean It was perfect

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Only compliant is Staff at Reception was very Rude during check out We really felt that staff was differentiating people by their skin color We were not staying there for free We had paid full amount of the hotel rent Thanks Hemal Shah

Negative_Review: Provide the guest minimum one or two water bottles free a day as a courtesy
Positive_Review: It is very well located and easy access to the main train station Also very clean rooms and friendly staff at your service

Negative_Review: Our room was hot and we could not get it to cool down
Positive_Review: They were especially accommodating to the kids with a play area at the reception lobby and complimentary toys upon arrival

Negative_Review: When ordering room service make sure they repeat to you your order You may not receive everything when it arrives to your room Downstairs bathroom by lobby was out of order our whole stay at the hotel
Positive_Review: The free breakfast has a lot of options Comfortable rooms separate for the toilette not in the same bathroom as the shower

Negative_Review: Air con didn t work Asked for service to fix different issues nothing was done Done staff were rude No city view as per our booking House keeping was slack and not up to standard
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: It was a little further from the center of town than we had hoped but it was close to the Metro and an overall nice property
Positive_Review: The hotel was nice and the breakfast was great

Renovated room not big but big enough to accomodate 2 adults 2 small children Room was silent and the beds were very comfortable Very handy usb charging points directly from the wall Great breakfast Fairly priced rooms considering the overall price levels in Paris Walking distance from several iconic attractions

Negative_Review: On May 11 8 30am I called to borrow a hairdryer since the one in the room was not working I also asked if I could borrow an iron The lady staff in the front desk told me that they were too busy to bring those items to our room so I must get them downstairs I did because as I said the hairdryer in the room was not working In the lobby beside the front desk the bespactled front desk lady staff gave me the huge ironing board the iron and the hair drier which I carried myself and brought to our room located at the end of the hallway How we treat our guests is a very important part of our overall experience Guests stay in a hotel with a mindset that their needs will be catered to and also expect that people tending to them will exude a certain level of joy in serving you We are paying for our stay and for their services and that was the first impression I got I have stayed in so many hotels around the world and it was my first time to be treated this way The sink in our bathroom was draining so slow almost clogged but I did not bother to raise my concern because of how cold the staff treated me on our first day of stay I will never recommend this hotel to anyone and I will never book with them ever It was the worst hotel experience I got
Positive_Review: That we had a place to stay

Negative_Review: Not good value for money The main hall area of the hotel seems to be used by external customers as well using the bar Seats of the sofa there are not clean stints everywhere Even though rooms are ok they are very small
Positive_Review: Room service was great

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The place is really nice and very clean Nice toiletries provided and the beds were actually not too bad Staff was very helpful especially with the kids Breakfast was superb We would stay again in a heartbeat

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This was a very kid friendly hotel with a welcome gift for both kids on arrival as well as children s entertainment during breakfasts The room was fairly spacious and I really appreciated the shower and tub as well as separate toilet facilities I really felt we got value for money and the cherry on top was a late checkout at 5pm at no extra cost when our flight was departing at 10pm that night

Negative_Review: I don t think its the hotel s responsibility but the overgrown tree beds outside the hotel entrance needed to be taken care of
Positive_Review: Eggs were fluffy The breakfast buffet had an excellent range of choices We also had dinner in restaurant and were very pleased with our appetizers warm goat cheese and prosciutto and melon and our pork with mustard sauce main course

Negative_Review: 1 We requested to have our two rooms on the same floor Since they were not we were reassigned only not giving us the same amenities 2 The room 312 was on the back side of the building and the sound from outdoors with windows closed was terrible We could hear a woman voice making announcements etc 3 We did not like that breakfasts were not included They did give us two breakfasts but we lost money on the reassignment
Positive_Review: The room was clean except for the carpet under the bed We would have liked to have a few more TV channels in English

Negative_Review: I did not like the location I booked it because it said it was really close to the Eiffel Tower like a 15 minute walk or something However it was not It was very far more like a 45min 1hr walk There wasn t that much around the hotel it was on a very quiet street just a few restaurants around the corner Everything else was really nice the hotel and the rooms were really modern looking and very clean very comfortable
Positive_Review: I liked the breakfast it had a lot of variety Very plentiful with a lot of choices I also liked the hotel itself it was very modern and very clean

Negative_Review: The room service guys some times skip to change the bed sheets of the sofa bed If you are travelling with family and plan to travel on metros then please consider the location is little far also there are less restaure ts nearby
Positive_Review: I really enjoyed the buffet breakfast rich variety quality and quantity of food Further to it I liked the rooms the beds and the beverages in it which were complimentary Wifi was equally good with best speed

Negative_Review: Amenities like Tea Coffee were not provided in the room Everyday we have to ask the reception to arrange for it Rooms are small being considered family of four 2 Adults and 2 Kids Location is near to the train station Staff is good
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: An itemised bill at time of checking out Told that this would be posted or emailed as yet not received
Positive_Review: The wide choice at breakfast The comfortable rooms Separate toilet within the en suite rooms

Negative_Review: Plates and kitchenware were dirty for breakfast Room was too small for a family and a bit uncomfortable
Positive_Review: Rich breakfast Great location Very responsive staff

Negative_Review: My only complaint was that the bathtub wasn t totally clean had some stray hairs from a previous guest
Positive_Review: We stayed with our four children in two adjoining rooms and it was very pleasant The rooms were just as pictured very neat and tidy They had the extra beds already made for us which was very nice They spoke English and had their own car garage just underneath the hotel Also we accidentally left our passports in our safe and the staff found them and took them to the front desk to hold for us so that was very appreciated

Negative_Review: Roms are a bit small for 4 good for 2 feasible for 3 really a bit small for 4
Positive_Review: Friendly staff Parking below the hotel for a decent rate Good breakfast

Negative_Review: very expensive majority of staff didn t speak English which we suffered during our stay only one elevator was working so we took much time to go up down breakfast options is very limited and not suitable for Muslims restaurants is very small so sometimes we have to wait to get in room is very small and there is no wardrobe really was not convenient stay at all
Positive_Review: location is good near from many historical places

Negative_Review: The staff at the reception specially this guy working there so rude and with bad manner never been treated so bad in hotel Like this hotel
Positive_Review: Nice hotel the rooms clean and tidy

Negative_Review: We only recieve 1 small bottle of water per day for 4 person we have to request more bubblebath soap beacause we just recieve 1 stk per day and upon checked in we we have to deposit 200 euros but we checked out yesterday 10 01 2017 until now the 200 euros is still in my credit account hope i can have IT back have to pay city tax for 20 euros
Positive_Review: The cleanliness and the bathtub location is little bit far but we manage to enjoy the view of Paris breakfast is great

Negative_Review: Restaurant and breakfast was a little pricey Location was relatively close to metro but not much in the area A little far from city attractions other than Eiffel Tower
Positive_Review: Food at the restaurant was delicious fresh and high quality Bar was great for an evening night cap after the kids went to sleep Convenient to have a restaurant onsite The kids area will games kept our children occupied

Negative_Review: dirty hallway on the room floors 6th floor light at the bed side did not work properly no english TV channel except CNN BBC coffee cup out of cartoon plastic pictures on the web gives you a wrong impression e g nespresso machine Said all this for EUR 190 i would expect better
Positive_Review: The staff was very nice and helpful full stop

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel receptionist they are very bad even they are not ready to listen any complaints My room key is not working properly and I informed them to solve the problem but not on time I use to go my room to open 4 5 times from reception to my room trying to open the door and after long they Chang my room lately

Negative_Review: No enough staff when I need a service they tell me to come by myself and collect whatever I oredered No staff to help you out with your luggage even
Positive_Review: Location is great

Negative_Review: The toilet overflowed which can happen to anyone but they did not deal with it in an effective manner I brought the problem to their attention at 11am as sewer was overflowing in the room and by 12midnight it was not addressed It was after midnight when we were given a new room The room was for three persons and the beds were only dressed for 2 They also provided no towels shocking experience When I spoke to the night manager he took no responsibility and blamed the day manager for not addressing the problem
Positive_Review: Nothing this was a very poor experience

Negative_Review: On checkout we were charged an extra 83 Euro on top of the already paid contract price made through booking com having been told booking com didnt charge us correctly Very disappointing so not sure I will be using the website anymore to avoid nasty surprises like this
Positive_Review: Comfortable hotel location fine

Negative_Review: Further than we thought to walk anywhere need to get a metro to all places unless u want a long walk
Positive_Review: Very clean and spacious rooms Metro station not too far and good local shop nearby

Negative_Review: The room was too hot air con didn t seem to be working properly and with the city heat made it quite uncomfortable
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfortable Location was fab for our requirements

Negative_Review: Not much to complain about we shopped around to find a good deal this was a good price for central Paris so had low expectations The only thing which was a small negative was the cost of the car park was 22 per day but given location may be reasonable
Positive_Review: Very child friendly balloon sculptor came round at breakfast and made an amazing flower by far the best balloon modeller I have seen Reception area is great nice area for kids and great champagne bar Car parking is hotel is great safe secure and decent size

Negative_Review: If we had to give a minus point it would be for the prices of food and drink in the restaurant and bar When we arrived we just wanted a snack and was shocked when we looked at the prices We didn t want to look rude so we ordered 4x portions of fries at 20 This would have doubled if we would have ordered 4x cokes for drink I suppose they have to get their money back on the free room mini bars from somewhere To be fair this was the norm for all over Paris We thought prices were going to be on par with London and we were wrong It was very hot and we were shocked to have to pay 12 or more everytime we had a drink roughly every hour
Positive_Review: After spending more than 1hr finding the hotel after leaving the Metro we was just happy to finally find it When we walked in the door first impressions were good We then went to reception to book our bags in and was told we could have our room more than 2 hrs early Reception staff spoke very good English and were very polite and could not do enough for us The rooms were very clean with free toiletries and a free mini bar re stocked every day The beds were very comfortable as was the whole room and hotel Breakfast was very nice and plentiful Both times we had breakfast there were free activities for the children Our two teenage children especially liked the body painting and didn t want to wash the artwork off their arms and legs This hotel made our stay in Paris and we would give it the best rating possible

Negative_Review: I dont think anything could be better we where met by friendly staff check in was quick and efficent information pass on to us and questions answered
Positive_Review: The room and staff excellent and very helpful This made our last day in France wonderfull we take home great memories no bad stories

Negative_Review: Pics had a nespresso machine none in room and the fridges in room were poor
Positive_Review: Good location when you get used to metro Montparnasse is bustling and vibrant Plenty of caf s etc mcdonalds for young ones The hotel staff were great

Negative_Review: Staff is not very freindly Rooms are not cleaned well We have to ask for water everyday and sometimes they say it is finished Rooms are very small We booked 1 room connected and they said they don t have this type of rooms and this is booking com mistake and they can t resolve it It ended up family was separated and disappointed
Positive_Review: Almost nothing

Negative_Review: There wasn t much around the hotel and the subway stations were all a good walk away
Positive_Review: There wasn t much around the hotel and the subway stations were all a good walk away

Negative_Review: 7 minutes away from train station Rooms are small but again this is Paris and most hotel rooms are small
Positive_Review: Nice reception with toys and books so kids loved hanging out there Rooms are clean and staff is super friendly

Negative_Review: No latch on window so couldn t open it at night as we have small children
Positive_Review: Beds were really comfortable bathroom was clean and modern Bar reasonable priced

Negative_Review: The hotel is old and room is too small and on top of this the AC is not working in all the hotel as when we ask for a fan they told no more as all the fans given to other rooms Brecfast is very poor and not enough for all guests The night duty manager is careless to all guests and keep on telling for any thing this is not my business you should see my colleague The refrigerator also in all rooms not working you have to go to the par to get cold drink even water In all on all very bad experience not advisable to any one
Positive_Review: I did not like any thing

Negative_Review: There is only one thing that made us very upset Though we paid in cash the hotel kept 560 euros as a deposit from our prepaid card for 20 days The hotel should tell its customers that it will hold their money as a deposit not for 2 or 3 days as they said but for 20 to 25 days That is the truth
Positive_Review: breakfast was very good also the bed was comfortable The personnel is very helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We had two rooms for our family The beds were comfortable and had plenty of pillows We have been traveling in a few different countries and this has been one of the best hotels thus far My kids enjoyed playing foosball babyfoot in the lobby to pass the time between activities They liked the breakfast offerings and I was happy they had a kettle on the room with tea and coffee

Negative_Review: I wish I had not been robbed in the lobby by some unknown character All the euros I had wired from the US after the first robbery were stolen at the hotel lobby Western Union was closed during my stay due to the national holiday I filed a police report about the second robbery in Paris I had previously filed a report with the police in Aubagne France
Positive_Review: The staff especially the manager Xavier the assistant manager Anais and Nicolas Dan took very good care of me in light of a very negative situation I was left with no money passport Global Entry Card or anything else of any value as a result of a robbery at the reception desk I had previously been robbed of my telephone credit cards bank card euros and dollars at the train station at Lyons France

Negative_Review: 1 the 18 eur breakfast is not worthy 2 the thermostat in the shower is a stupid device even i am an engineer and familiar with these things i need time to find the suitable temperature for me compare to the waste of water when i adjust the so called energy saving with thermostat is nothing
Positive_Review: 1 although i have problems for the payment online the hotel keep my reservation 2 staff are very friendly 3 facilities in the lobby are children s favorite 4 good location easy for transport 5 the sofa bed is really good for family

Negative_Review: No mirror on the wall at the dresser beside the sockets for my wife to use her hair dryer and straighteners Very inconvenient No iron in the room
Positive_Review: Great location for what we wanted Meir Eiffel tower

Negative_Review: A sink with the toilet
Positive_Review: Rooms were very clean every day Location in city center facilitated getting around to major sites Nice to have a restaurant on site

Negative_Review: Only one bath wash tube was being provided every day while we were three of us The shower door would not close properly so after a shower the entire floor used to be wet and we had to mop the floor with the small towels
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good Helpful staff Close to metro Clean hotel

Negative_Review: Confusion about my bookings Apparently one of my bookings was cancelled but reinstated at a higher rate Location is an awkward walk from the Montparnasse metro
Positive_Review: Superb bed Sleeping arrangements for 2 2 very good

Negative_Review: we would have prefered if the staff had directed us to the best train station Montparnasse was a very complicated underground for those who are new to Paris and especially with kids and luggage so the first day was very exsausting next day we found through othere guest who stayed there that Pasteur was the ideal station
Positive_Review: The croissants were the best I ate in Paris

Negative_Review: Small tasteless croissants Please bring back the larger ones
Positive_Review: Friendly staff location great comfortable beds fridge great tv Plentiful breakfast

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Novotel have their standard and the same as this branch Location is good as you can find supermarket not too far Underground station is about 10 mins walk Breakfast is always great and free for children

Negative_Review: Arrived late and tired because of the train strike to find that our booking had been cancelled Staff did rally and reassured we could stay but the delay in the reassurance and the cold way we were treated was poor I was a bit tired and emotional but it was wrong to laugh at my reaction
Positive_Review: Easy to book

Negative_Review: No complaints at all
Positive_Review: This hotel is really well located for a tourist to view the sights of Paris The amazing eiffel tower view just metres from the hotel door is a bonus We found it much nicer and cheaper to eat in the nearby Montparnasse restaurants Definitely not the overpriced Paris that you are warned about Hotel was of usual Novotel excellent standard with the comfiest bed in the world Just what you want after a day trekking around the city with 2 small children

Negative_Review: Not even a small washbasin in toilet which is not too hygienic though the room had both shower and bath but with a separate entrance Almost nothing upset us
Positive_Review: Good location especially for those traveling further by rail variety of tea coffee hot dishes fruits bakery pastry for breakfast and it is an early one which was another pro the staff was friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Weren t expecting such a nice hotel Staff were extremely friendly rooms were comfortable and clean and the breakfast was amazing All in all a great stay

Negative_Review: There was only one part time English kids channel
Positive_Review: The breakfast in the restaurant was very nice The rooms were clean and service was great All the staff were very friendly and helpful For our family the adjacent rooms were perfect for a short break

Negative_Review: Nothing We loved it
Positive_Review: So happy I picked this hotel Would have loved to stay longer but we were only in Paris for one night It was a short walk to Montparnasse so the kids got to see the fabulous night skyline with the Eiffel tower The beds were so comfortable we didn t want to get up the breakfast was 10 10 Great selection of tasty foods to choose from The staff were very helpful gave the kids a small gift on our arrival Will definitely choose this hotel again for our next trip to Paris Close to the Metro for visiting all the sites

Negative_Review: not quite as nice as some other Novotels Probably could do with a bit of refreshment
Positive_Review: The options for breakfast buffet or at the bar Friendly staff useful to have a car park even if a little pricey

Negative_Review: Parking is bad and to mutch money The children beds where not already instald The toilet was dirty in the room
Positive_Review: The location is good in the middle of the center The breakfast as exellent bud 20 is a lot money

Negative_Review: They didn t tell me about the shopping centre I knew it by chance The shuttle bus is not working with the same hours of Disney so if you wait until Disney closes you will have to go back by taxi The family room is basically a bed and a sofa bed Not a lot of food options in the evening
Positive_Review: The breakfast was perfect but needed more cheese options since we are in France Located close to shopping area and Disney but half hour away by train from Paris

Negative_Review: The night front help desk was awful When I asked him to send somebody to pick up my luggage he told me to look for a cart and carry my bags on my own The guy was unpleasant unfriendly and disagreeable
Positive_Review: Located just next to Gare Montparnasse train Station

Negative_Review: Breakfast need more variety
Positive_Review: A very good size room absolutely clean toilet and staff are ever friendly It a very convenient location to travel to tourist attractions

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were really friendly always willing to help us Any requests asked we were given top service amazing hotel definatly return Nice location being in the middle of everything

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Not far from the metro Staff was great Family friendly during breakfast ballon and tatoo artist Nice breakfast 4 people room 20 euro per day garage

Negative_Review: No thing
Positive_Review: The staff honest and highly cooperative I lost 2200 eur and I don t know last out side or inside hotel the house kepping found it and brought it to me

Negative_Review: Shower leaked a lot onto bathroom floor due to design fault No full length mirror in room
Positive_Review: Quiet location with easy access to metro train bus Good breakfast Helpful staff at reception

Negative_Review: I paid more for a room with a Queen size bed and a panoramic view on the city However the room had a really twin bed even smaller than the regular size with a view on a secondary street facing a really ugly building Moreover the room was so small that the position of the bed prevented the door of the bathroom from being closed
Positive_Review: Position easibly accessible by car and not distant from the metro station

Negative_Review: Room too small for family of 3 One person needed to step aside to allow the other to pass by Self service cabinet needs more selection Arrived after midnight unable to get anything to eat or drink unless we wanted to pay nearly 5 for a can of cola
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Having to come home
Positive_Review: Great area loads of restaurants transport links fantastic plenty of shops and a lovely view of the Eiffel Tower Will definitely return loved this area

Negative_Review: After we left our room about 2pm in the afternoon how comes cleaners are going in our rooms who cleans rooms at that time my brand new shoes are missing aswel as a couple of new rings I had are also missing before we left the hotel checked my whole room my husband double checked it found nothing thank God my rings were not real otherwise that would of been a big loss thank god for that but the cleaners really need to be taught a lesson this is not on bloody thieves novatel hotel sort it out
Positive_Review: Reception staff was very very polite and made us feel comfortable very helpful staff

Negative_Review: Location isn t great was charged 100 euro for 2 days of parking but haven t called to complain yet wish I had been a lot closer to city center
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Buffet breakfast a bit of a shambles no spoons cups or plates but food was ok not the best buffet in the world average I would say but was enough to get us started on the day
Positive_Review: Guy at the desk very helpful Gave directions and told us places to go that were nice

Negative_Review: Some clerk knocked the door I asked who it is no one answered after two minutes he opened the door and as headed for the door he handed me an envelope from the reception
Positive_Review: I felt home

Negative_Review: Breakfast area is small comparing to the amount of people making the place very crouded The bed headboard in my room broke in the middle of the night creating relevant noise and waking me up Carpet smelled quite bad Mini bar fridge in the room turns off so it has NO use When mentioned all of the above to the receptionist she didnt care at all and she was quite rude and didn t try to assist except to repair the bed No apology was expressed at any time and checked out the next day Very disappointed
Positive_Review: The location is good Staff in restaurant area is very nice

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff was consistently friendly and helpful we walked to many sights in the city a bit of a walk but we enjoyed it and the rooms are clean and comfortable Very good value

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was really clean modern and well organised I really liked the family breakfast with entertainers And it was a great location to go sightseeing The reception staff were really helpful

Negative_Review: Nothing No value for money for tiny room with grumpy staff I should of rented Paris apartment for same as this hotel which I am doing now 2 bedroom 100sqm 2 bathrooms and toilet located in Ternes for same daily costs as Novetel Paris central Never again will I book Hotels on the basics of nice advertising photos and fictitious customer reviews if anyone says that the Novetel Paris is an excellent hotel then I know that that is pure fiction and possibly other hotels on your site are possibly just the same Get back to me if you need any further information Thanks Peter Woroniuk
Positive_Review: What I did like was the morning breakfast Chef at the buffet at least he smiled and said Good Morning when he brought out the hot food even though he cooked the same every morning The buffet breakfast was like first in best served chaos at the best people scrambling pushing food exactly the same every morning pile of fatty bacon tasteless scrambled eggs and small sausages No change and if that is not enough at times the waitresses didn t even want to let you in only if you piled up what you wanted to eat at one time only and then sit down never ever again would I stay or even recommend this hotel I have had better at mining camps in the middle of the West Australian desert Thanks Peter Woroniuk

Negative_Review: Room service called up at late in the night and asked us to pay for the food room service even though it was agreed that it will be added to the final bill of hotel After some discussions they asked us to next day morning next day when I went to pay they told that it will be included in the final bill This is not a good experience from a leading start hotel
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Distance to Airport and Disneyland There was a metro nearby though
Positive_Review: The staff were great particularly a lady on reception called Anais She was very lovely and knowledgeable and made our stay wonderful The rooms were clean and comfy

Negative_Review: The location It s near the station but a long walk from both stations The staff didn t give accurate information regarding the destinations and distance and even international calls rates That made us waste more time money and tired at the end
Positive_Review: Good for family with littel children

Negative_Review: Small points two paper cups in room for tea coffee which meant reusing if you wanted another a proper cup would be nicer We were also awoken on our first night in the early hours by the fire alarm apparently somebody having a hot shower It was very chaotic and nobody took charge of communicating what was happening to us outside the hotel including families with cold frightened children We ended up going back inside to find out what was happening when it was evident there was no fire
Positive_Review: Room comfortable and very clean Children really welcomed children s breakfast with entertainment and children s menu in the restaurant along with gift when they arrive Very friendly staff in restaurant Sabrina in particular Bar lobby area comfortable to sit and relax good not to have to spend all your time at hotel in your room Convenient to metro so easy to get around

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location was just perfect for planning daily visits around the city The hotel facilities were more than adequate and the staff were very helpful

Negative_Review: No bad experiences just wish the hotel was a bit closer to the centre it s about a 15 20 min walk to the metro and the hop on off stop when you re walking with the kids
Positive_Review: Quality of hotel I like Novotel standards Breakfast available for family clown came in and made balloon shapes too which was great

Negative_Review: The breakfast is a bit pricey but then it s in Paris g
Positive_Review: Stone throw to the train station Very decent and affordable eat out close by Wonderful staff and facilities Great location

Negative_Review: On checking in I asked if I could upgrade to a suite I was told they weren t available but I could have an executive room including minibar and dressing gown neither of which I would use so I declined BUT later realised I was being charged for After complaining I was given a 4 euro a night discount Not good enough don t employ staff at the front desk if they are not Fluent in understanding and speaking English but it was a great hotel
Positive_Review: Everything near stations and great room size Stefania at breakfast was the sweetest most helpful person I ve encountered at a hotel

Negative_Review: When we came at 9 p m our room was not ready and we had to wait for 10 minutes but we were offered free drinks There is a broken equipment in the fitness center
Positive_Review: Very comfortable beds the silence in the room is perfect Tea pot in the room

Negative_Review: Coffee and restrictions on evening restaurant menu
